remarks: The first version of the Axiom of Infinity ~ ax-inf proved from the second version ~ ax-inf2 .  Note that we didn't use ~ ax-reg , unlike the other direction ~ axinf2 .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2009.)
statement:
axinf $p |- E. y ( x e. y /\ A. z ( z e. y -> E. w ( z e. w /\ w e. y ) ) ) $.
$d w x y z $.
